replies.commentText: Hua Huo (èŠ±ç«, meaning "firework"), by Wang Feng (æ±ªå³°)

google translate here.
This is a no ending performance
Include all ridiculous and crazy
Like a child full of sadness
Quietly sleeping on the earth

Now I'm tired of it
Tired like a broken wild flowers by the wind
So I started to change
Become like a group of rolling hot fire

Look at the front of the crowd proud of laughing
The hearts of the surging waves
Dancing in the wilderness
Feel wild and broken brilliant

Now I'm drunk
Drunk like a wild pigeon that can not find the direction
So I started to change
Become like a group of violent hot fire

Blue dream sleep in the quietly passing the car
Beautiful children lost on the path
This is an eternal beauty of life
No tears without sorrow

Now I'm tired of it
Tired like a broken wild flowers by the wind
So I started to change
Become like a group of rolling hot fire

Now I'm drunk
Drunk like a wild pigeon that can not find the direction
So I started to change
Become like a group of violent hot fire
